Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Cheverly Station is a dog and cat, pet-friendly community. We allow a maximum of 2 pets (dogs or cats) per apartment. Pet fees, deposits and breed restrictions apply. The following breed restrictions include dogs that are known to be aggressive towards strangers and / or children, or to be destructive in indoor environments. Pets that contain a mix of any of the breeds listed are not permitted. Restricted Pet Breeds are the following: * American Pit Bull Terrier, American Bulldog, Doberman Pincher, Rottweiler, German Shepherd, Tosa Inu, Staffordshire Terrier (American or Bull), Bull Terrior, Mastiff, Bullmastiff, Presa Canario, Cane Corso, Siberian Husky, Malamute, Wolf-Dog Hybrid, Great Dane, St. Bernard, Akita, Chow-Chow. 
* $50 Monthly Pet Rent
* $240 Fee
